title: UI/UX Designer
description:
- Understand the current workflow of our users and find “What’s the problem”
- Create a wireframe to check the user experience
- Create a visual design with a graphic tool
- Manage tasks based on the business needs and priority as the company
- Be the last person in the team to give up the details.
requirements:
- 8+ years of experience as a UI/UX designer, information architect, UX researcher or similar.
- Experience in using graphic tools such as Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch etc.
- A portfolio of work demonstrating experience creating design solutions and showing your ability to turn ideas into impactful business results.
- Understand the problem and propose various solutions to continuously improve our service
- Able to communicate smoothly with other colleagues
- Excellent communication in English & Vietnamese
